nodes.text: ARENA-7580 was a state-of-the-art holoprojector developed by Imlok during the waning years of the Old Republic.

With the combined input of on-site cameras and tracking sensors, this platform-mounted tactical monitoring system displayed a detailed, three-dimensional view of the battlefield. It was capable of identifying minute details amidst the chaos of war, such as individual troop movement.

The Geonosian War Chamber located within Stalgasin hive was outfitted with this device during the First Battle of Geonosis. Even with the added benefits of the ARENA-7580, CIS forces were sent into retreat by the Clone Army.
